title: All In: EGym’s bid for the throne

replies.body: I read the article and enjoyed it but I'm annoyed that the title of the article doesn't seem to correlate with the content. Still confused with title atm.

Hey dude, thanks for the feedback. I do struggle to come up with titles at times - I have these stories that I want to tell, but it's hard to make it sound snappy in a few words. What would you suggest?
"EGYM: Taking the bull by the horns" "EGYM: The ideas man"  I reckon either of your minor headings could have been candidates to be the title

great article found it interesting incite into his life, a lot of players could take a leaf out of his book and in game concentrate and focus stop talking shit in chat and focus its the key to players like his success!
